title: Cinematic Sci-fi Music: Phaethon
description: 2 hours of foreboding ambiences, dream like orchestral pieces, hypnotic drum rhythms and earth-shaking chants.
longDescription:
Please click here to preview the pack


At over 2 hours long across 40 tracks plus 1 bonus intro track, themes of prophecy, salvation and new beginnings will transport your players to worlds afar.


From eerie and ominous ambiences to calm and peaceful orchestral scores to epic drums and intense tribal percussion, this is a versatile pack featuring instruments and voices from all over the world.


Phaethon will accompany any game that calls for a Sci-fi-esq score but can feel at home in other genres as well. Please feel free to listen to the pack on YouTube while play testing your game to see how well they can accompany each other.


All tracks have been written in keys that will flow seamlessly between each track regardless of the playback order. Similar instruments have been used across all tracks, and the pack has an overall theme to ensure that each track feels coherent and consistent with one another.


All 40 tracks come with loops and an intro and outro file.


Some tracks come with an additional “fade in stinger outro” file used to end tracks based on player decisions.


All tracks were made using industry standard software, hardware, and instruments to give you professional studio quality audio, all mixed and mastered specifically to allow SFX and dialog to cut through the music.


All music from Daifuku Audio is not content ID registered as so people who stream your created game/media will not receive content ID claims on YouTube/Twitch because of the audio from this pack.


Pack contains:

40 full tracks plus bonus intro track: 2 hours 4 minutes and 41 seconds

Looped variants: 2 hours 5 minutes and 6 seconds

Total pack: 4 hours 9 minutes and 48 seconds

164 wav audio files

164 cues

Pack is 2.46GB uncompressed


Each track has been named and divided into 2 main folders, "full tracks" and "loops".

Each looped version has been chopped as such:

song_name_01_intro

song_name_02_loop

song_name_03_outro


Please note:

Only some tracks contain optional stinger endings.

Some tracks only contain one loop and an outro, whereas some tracks have even more loops than in the example listed above. This is due to the different levels of complexity composed for each track.


It is also possible to make your own loops by chopping the original full tracks or by setting up loop points in the Unreal engine if so preferred.


Artwork by Noirsroom


Thank you for looking!
